property.name: AFTER_SELECTION_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_SELECTION_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after an attribute on the active selection changes. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_DEACTIVATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before the LayoutWindow becomes inactive. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_ACTIVATE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after the LayoutWindow becomes active. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
property.shortdesc: Dispatched when the value of a property changes on this LayoutWindow. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_OPEN
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a LayoutWindow is opened. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_CLOSE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a LayoutWindow is closed. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_CLOSE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched when a LayoutWindow is closing. Since the close has been committed, it can no longer be canceled. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the LayoutWindow.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the LayoutWindow &#40;a Document).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the LayoutWindow within its containing object.

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: viewDisplaySetting
property.shortdesc: The display performance preferences override for the view.

property.name: transformReferencePoint
property.shortdesc: The default anchor point around which to transform objects. Can return: AnchorPoint enumerator or Array of 2 Units.

property.name: activeLayer
property.shortdesc: The active layer. Can also accept: String.

property.name: zoomPercentage
property.shortdesc: The size &#40;as a percentage) to which to enlarge or reduce the view of the document. (Range: 5 to 4000)

property.name: activeSpread
property.shortdesc: The front-most spread. Can return: Spread or MasterSpread.

property.name: activePage
property.shortdesc: The front-most page.

property.name: screenMode
property.shortdesc: The screen mode for layout view.

property.name: overprintPreview
property.shortdesc: If true, display a simulation of overprinting.

property.name: proofingProfile
property.shortdesc: The profile used for proofing colors.

property.name: proofingType
property.shortdesc: The method of proofing colors.

property.name: simulateInkBlack
property.shortdesc: If true, simulates the dark gray produced by many printers in place of solid black, according to the proofing profile. Note: Valid only when proofing type is custom.

property.name: simulatePaperWhite
property.shortdesc: If true, simulates the dingy white of real paper, according to the proofing profile. Note: Valid only when proofing type is custom.

property.name: preserveColorNumbers
property.shortdesc: If true, leaves color values unchanged for CMYK objects without embedded profiles and native objects such as line art or type. Note: Converts images whose profiles differ from the profile of the simulated device. Valid only when proofing type is custom.

property.name: selection
property.shortdesc: The selected object&#40;s). Can also accept: Object or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: bounds
property.shortdesc: The bounds of the window &#40;specified in pixels) in the form [top, left, bottom, right].

property.name: selectionKeyObject
property.shortdesc: The key object of the selection. Can also accept: NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: zoom
method.shortdesc: Magnifies or reduces the window to the specified display size.

parameter.name: selectableItems
parameter.shortdesc: The objects to select. Can accept: Object, Array of Objects, NothingEnum enumerator or SelectAll enumerator.

parameter.name: existingSelection
parameter.shortdesc: The selection status of the LayoutWindow in relation to previously selected objects. &#40;Optional)

method.name: bringToFront
method.shortdesc: Brings the object to the front.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the LayoutWindow.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
